name: Defensive Rune
description: Place a rune of protection on yourself for 2 minutes. While active, the next enemy to attack you is imprisoned in a constricting sphere of dark magic, stunning them after a short delay for 3 seconds.  This stun cannot be blocked.
effectLines: Cast spell on self, stunning the next enemy who attacks you.
rawDescription:
Place a rune of protection on yourself for <<1>>. While active, the next enemy to attack you is imprisoned in a constricting sphere of dark magic, stunning them after a short delay for <<2>>.

This stun cannot be blocked.
